mapper.insert: insert into user(name, username, age, sex, phone, address) values (#{ name }, #{ username }, #{ age }, #{ sex }, #{ phone }, #{ address })
mapper.update: update user set name =#{name}, age = #{age}, sex=#{sex}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, updatetime=#{updatetime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from user
name like concat('%',#{ name },'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{ phone },'%')
order by id desc
